flawed_nl_solution:
The normal price of the lessons would be 20*40=$<<20*40=8000>>8000
The discount saves him 8000*0.25=$<<8000*0.25=2000.0>>2000.0
So the lessons cost him 8000-2000.0=$<<8000-2000.0=6000.0>>6000.0
That means everything costs 500+6000.0=$<<500+6000.0=6500.0>>6500.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 800, not 8000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
